recommendations.name: Afuri
recommendations.description: Light, yuzu-flavored ramen in a sleek modern setting. Perfect introduction to Tokyo ramen.

recommendations.name: Gen Yamamoto
recommendations.description: Omakase cocktail bar with seasonal Japanese ingredients. Intimate 8-seat counter.

recommendations.name: TeamLab Borderless
recommendations.description: Immersive digital art museum. Book tickets in advance — sells out fast.

recommendations.name: Shimokitazawa Vintage Shops
recommendations.description: Wander the narrow streets for incredible vintage clothing, vinyl records, and quirky cafés.

recommendations.name: Get a Suica card immediately
recommendations.description: Load it up at the airport. Works on all trains, buses, and most convenience stores.

recommendations.name: Fushimi Inari at Dawn
recommendations.description: Go at 5-6am to experience the thousand torii gates without crowds. Magical.

recommendations.name: Dotonbori Street Food
recommendations.description: Takoyaki, okonomiyaki, gyoza — just walk and eat. That's the whole plan.
